headline: Everest Group Names Broadridge BPO as a Leader in 2025 Capital Markets Operations Services PEAK Matrix速 Assessment
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR), a global Fintech leader, today announced its recognition as a Leader in capital markets operations by independent research firm Everest Group in its 2025 Capital Markets Operations Services PEAK Matrix速 Assessment.
